content:
The location of the Marriott Marquis Chicago is indeed very convenient for conferences and events, being connected to the McCormick Place convention center. It's great that you were able to walk to your venue easily, saving you time and hassle.

Glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel's breakfast buffet! A good breakfast can really set the tone for the day, and it sounds like the Marriott delivered on that front. The signature omelette and fresh fruit platter sound delicious, and it's great that they had a good selection of options to cater to different tastes and dietary needs.

Breakfast buffets can sometimes be hit-or-miss, but it's clear that the Marriott Marquis Chicago is doing something right. Did you try any of their other dining options, such as the on-site restaurants or room service?

Also, how was the overall atmosphere and vibe of the hotel? Was it bustling and lively, or more quiet and relaxed?
